## Proposed fields

Add optional fields to
- [ ] _span context_
- [ ] _transaction context_

as always, this should also be added to the _error context_.

| Intake API field | Elasticsearch field | Elasticsearch Type    |
| -----------------|---------------------|-----------------------|
|                  |                     | <indexed/not indexed> |
